attributes.additional_details: Renationalise all water companies, so they are run in the interest of the public and not for profit. Now would be the perfect time as most,  if not all, water companies are failing
attributes.background: Water companies are clearly  not being run in the interest of the country.  These companies are still rewarding the high earning executives and also shareholders and letting down the public. They are not investing in updating pipelines, building new reservoirs,  resolving water pollution issues.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638414
